metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22897 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: curl 7.61.0 through 7.76.1 suffers from exposure of data element to wrongsession due to a mistake in the code for CURLOPT_SSL_CIPHER_LIST whenlibcurl is built to use the Schannel TLS library. The selected cipher setwas stored in a single "static" variable in the library, which has thesurprising side-effect that if an application sets up multiple concurrenttransfers, the last one that sets the ciphers will accidentally control theset used by all transfers. In a worst-case scenario, this weakens transportsecurity significantly.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
